text: Sat at the window for at least 5 minutes with no sign of anyone in the store at all. Finally pulled off and someone drove up behind me and someone came right to the window. Not sure if they just didn't hear when I pulled up but they should …More

name: Clifford Shiver
text: Wow, I was pleasantly surprised to find new people working here. Store was clean and employees spoke to you with a smile. When bread sticks didn't rise properly, I was told about the issue and not just find out later. Manager even asked if I had the time to wait for another batch to finish, at no charge. Happy to see a difference.

name: Keith Delp
text: Voted best value eating several years in a row. Fresh, hot pizza for cary out. Experienced employees make for high quality, accurate orders. The drive through is an added bonus.

text: Not enough staff in the store to run it properly. I went in on a Saturday and there were only two employees present. Needs better management.
